definition[0]: muted sounds, voices etc are quieter than usual
example[0]: Everyone was sitting round discussing the accident in muted voices.
definition[1]: a muted reaction to something is not expressed strongly
example[1]: There was muted agreement from most of the people in the room.
example[2]: The speech received only a muted response from the unions.
definition[2]: a muted colour or light is soft and gentle, not bright
definition[3]: a muted musical instrument has been made to sound softer
